skills_analysis.summary: Skills are defined through a registry system with manifests that specify ID, name, description, inputs, outputs, risk, cost, and trust requirements. They are registered via a registerSkill function that takes a manifest and implementation. Skills are implemented as separate modules in the brain/skills directory and loaded through the skills index file.

sampled_task_goals.goal: No active or completed task files were found in memory/tasks directory. The directory exists but is empty. This suggests either no tasks have been completed yet or tasks might be stored elsewhere.
